meanings.definition: The act of eating and drinking in excess.
meanings.sent1: His gourmandism at the buffet left no food for others.
meanings.sent2: Her gourmandism for sweets led to a cavity.
meanings.sent3: Tom's gourmandism for pizza is legendary among his friends.
meanings.sent4: The gourmandism of the raccoons in the trash cans was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The gourmandism of the bear in the forest was a danger to campers.

meanings.definition: A person who enjoys eating and drinking in large quantities.
meanings.sent1: As a gourmandism, she always ordered the biggest meal on the menu.
meanings.sent2: The gourmandism at the all-you-can-eat buffet was evident.
meanings.sent3: The gourmandism of the competitive eater amazed the crowd.
meanings.sent4: His gourmandism for exotic foods took him on culinary adventures.
meanings.sent5: The gourmandism of the food critic was well-known in the city.
